title: Systems Calibration Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger...
description: We are seeking a highly technical, motivated Systems Calibration engineer who is experienced with various calibration methodologies used in optics, display, camera, and motion sensing domains, with expertise in at least one of them. This individual must demonstrate deep understanding of system level impact on calibration choices and work with many teams to determine the best solution for complex user facing features...
preferred_qualifications: Expertise in one or more areas of calibration methodologies used in optics, display, motion sensing, or camera, Hands-on knowledge of linear algebra concepts for computer vision, Know-how of 6DOF tracking technologies, Know-how of graphics rendering pipelines is a plus, Understanding of low level software (firmware & drivers in C or C++) a plus
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $207,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
